sample_papers.title: Military and Security Dimensions of Quantum Technologies
sample_papers.abstract: This paper explores how quantum technologies are shaping military security, including quantum encryption, sensors, and computing applications.

sample_papers.title: Attention Mechanisms in Deep Learning
sample_papers.abstract: Comprehensive overview of attention mechanisms and their role in modern neural architectures, particularly transformers.

sample_papers.title: Graph Neural Networks: A Survey
sample_papers.abstract: Survey of graph neural network architectures, applications, and recent advances in the field.

sample_papers.title: Federated Learning for Privacy-Preserving AI
sample_papers.abstract: Analysis of federated learning approaches for training machine learning models while preserving data privacy.

sample_papers.title: Large Language Models in Scientific Discovery
sample_papers.abstract: Applications of large language models in accelerating scientific research and hypothesis generation.
